Name: 流放之域
About the game: Overview of playing methods and combat operations 1. In the battle, the hero is mainly operated to fight (similar to MOBA operation): (a. Left click / box select and select hero. When there are multiple heroes in the team, press the 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 key on the keyboard to quickly select heroes. (b. Press Q/W/E on the keyboard to release the selected hero skill (c. Right click to move the selected hero (d. A floor: after selecting the hero, press the A key and then click the ground with the left mouse button. The hero will move to the target location and attack the enemies encountered along the way 2. Build and maintain the team outside the battle and select the attack route. (a. Limited food. The game fails when all food is consumed (b. Each team can only fight once a day. They can fight again after rest. Rest consumes 1 point of food. ( it will rest automatically in the early stages of the game) (c. After the battle, neither the enemy nor our side will recover, so we need to use resources for maintenance. At the end of each day, both the enemy and ourselves will recover a small amount of blood. (d. Please experience other contents in the game~ ----------------------------------------------------------- The protagonist YeLan is exiled to a mysterious field, so she embarks on the road of escaping and finding her partner. ----------------------------------------------------------- ·Casual strategy Use resources to build your team. Different combat units can deal with different battlefield conditions It is necessary to select appropriate attack targets on the large map, and different regions can obtain different resources ·A tense battle You can operate hero units. Heroes can use skills in combat. Better operation can effectively improve combat efficiency. Soldier units fight automatically At the same time, the game provides the function of battle speed adjustment. Rational use can save players' time or improve operation accuracy ·Rich hero units Heroes with different abilities can play a more powerful effect with the right combination. You can use resources to make heroes stronger, or equip your heroes with different skills ·Chapter The game has multiple chapters. Each chapter contains a certain number of areas. Conquering key areas can open the next chapter The total duration of the game is about 7 ~ 12 hours ----------------------------------------------------------- The game doesn't support English yet. It will be supported in the official version
